item.title: Christine add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Christine add a quote by Lynne Ewing
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. You get nowhere standing up, so get up on that seat and go!" -- Lynne Ewing

item.title: Christine add a quote by Lynne Ewing
item.description: "Daimonds are a girls best friend- they're sharper than knives" -- Lynne Ewing

item.title: Christine add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Christine add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Christine add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Christine add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christine add a quote by Mary Hoffman
